short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Otteri is an AI-powered extension for enhanced productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Otteri.ai is a Browser extension that brings powerful AI tools directly to your browser. It allows you to generate content, summarize articles, translate text, and automate various tasks without ever leaving the page you’re on.

With Otteri.ai, you can save time and enhance your productivity by streamlining everyday tasks. Whether you’re writing, researching, or simply browsing, Otteri.ai makes everything faster and smarter.

Perfect for anyone looking to work more efficiently, Otteri.ai turns your browser into an intelligent assistant. Install it today and unlock the potential of AI to supercharge your workflow.
